amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding by $50 million to the LIHEAP program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 565 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration, Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bass (NH) amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 322, 2 Present (Roll no. 71).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bass (NH) amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 322, 2 Present (Roll no. 71).
